text: Milton Ramírez Barboza (April 2, 1950 – August 18, 2022) was a Puerto Rican Major League Baseball infielder. He played for the St. Louis Cardinals from 1970 to 1971 and the Oakland Athletics in 1979."White Sox Acquire Henderson And Send Bradley to the Giants," The New York Times, Thursday, November 30, 1972. Retrieved March 10, 2020 Ramírez was born in Mayagüez, Puerto Rico. Ramírez died on August 18, 2022 in Mayagüez at the age of 72.Fallece el expelotero Milton Ramírez ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1950 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Puerto Rican baseball players Category:St. Louis Cardinals players Category:Oakland Athletics players
title: Milt Ramírez
